mapper.select: select a.ard_seq,a.ard_title ,b.mu_name ,b.mu_img_file ,c.ai_name from admin_recommend a inner join music_info b on a.ard_mu_seq = b.mu_seq inner join artist_info c on c.ai_seq = b.mu_ai_seq group by ard_title limit 1 offset #{offset}

select a.mu_seq,a.mu_name ,a.mu_img_file,a.mu_age,b.ard_title,c.ai_name from music_info a inner join admin_recommend b inner join artist_info c on a.mu_ai_seq = c.ai_seq where a.mu_seq = b.ard_mu_seq and b.ard_title = #{title} group by mu_name limit 8
select a.mu_seq ,a.mu_name ,a.mu_img_file ,b.ai_name from music_info a inner join artist_info b on a.mu_ai_seq = b.ai_seq order by mu_seq desc limit 10
select a.mu_seq ,a.mu_name ,a.mu_img_file,b.gr_seq ,b.gr_name from music_info a inner join genre_info b on a.mu_gr_seq = b.gr_seq group by b.gr_name order by mu_seq desc limit 5
select a.ab_seq ,a.ab_name ,a.ab_img_file ,b.ai_name from album_info a inner join artist_info b on a.ab_ai_seq = b.ai_seq order by ab_seq desc limit 10
